thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 72 of 625
thread.title: Jennifer Grossi-Silverman

author: Jennifer Grossi-Silverman
title: Jennifer Grossi-Silverman
text:
ORIGINAL REVIEW Not Impressed. It seems that everything I looked at was not available in my size.... small pants and medium top.
AFTER RECEIVING MY ORDER....So I was originally unhappy at the limited selection for my size however, I just received my order of 2 high waist pants and one 3 piece outfit....I LOVE EVERYTHING!!!
I will certainly give them another chance to increase stock of my size because the quality is amazing!
